item.value: String seq_num = ConfigService.getAppConfig().getProperty("igateway_socket_login_id", "S011") + "A"; String client_ip = ConfigService.getAppConfig().getProperty("client_ip", "119.23.110.75"); long msg_seq = CommonUtil.generateMsgReq(); String sentence = seq_num + "\t" + msg_seq + "\tReset Pwd\t" + req.getAccount_no() + "\t" + req.getId_no() + "\t" + client_ip + "\r\n"; String content = CommonUtil.invoke(sentence);
without sign on or invalid login

/** * Returns a string whose value is this string, with any leading and trailing * whitespace removed. *

* If this {@code String} object represents an empty character * sequence, or the first and last characters of character sequence * represented by this {@code String} object both have codes * greater than {@code '\u005Cu0020'} (the space character), then a * reference to this {@code String} object is returned. *

* Otherwise, if there is no character with a code greater than * {@code '\u005Cu0020'} in the string, then a * {@code String} object representing an empty string is * returned. *

* Otherwise, let k be the index of the first character in the * string whose code is greater than {@code '\u005Cu0020'}, and let * m be the index of the last character in the string whose code * is greater than {@code '\u005Cu0020'}. A {@code String} * object is returned, representing the substring of this string that * begins with the character at index k and ends with the * character at index m-that is, the result of * {@code this.substring(k, m + 1)}. *

* This method may be used to trim whitespace (as defined above) from * the beginning and end of a string. * * @return A string whose value is this string, with any leading and trailing white * space removed, or this string if it has no leading or * trailing white space. */

All messages must be sent after the socket sign on
Please notice that our iGateway will check the duplicate Index & Msg Seq. If there is different Caller, please make sure the Index & Msg Seq are unique.
Each socket must be sign on before any message  E.g. SignOn + tab + S001 + tab + S001

Message field is case-sensitive. For example, “A” is different from “a”.
3. Carriage Return CR (“\r\n”) is applied for message delimiter.
“~” is applied for the sub-field separator.
TAB is applied for field separator
Sample Code

/** * This class implements client sockets (also called just * "sockets"). A socket is an endpoint for communication * between two machines. *

* The actual work of the socket is performed by an instance of the * {@code SocketImpl} class. An application, by changing * the socket factory that creates the socket implementation, * can configure itself to create sockets appropriate to the local * firewall. * * @author unascribed * @see java.net.Socket#setSocketImplFactory(java.net.SocketImplFactory) * @see java.net.SocketImpl * @see java.nio.channels.SocketChannel * @since JDK1.0 */

/** * This class implements client sockets (also called just * "sockets"). A socket is an endpoint for communication * between two machines. *

* The actual work of the socket is performed by an instance of the * {@code SocketImpl} class. An application, by changing * the socket factory that creates the socket implementation, * can configure itself to create sockets appropriate to the local * firewall. * * @author unascribed * @see java.net.Socket#setSocketImplFactory(java.net.SocketImplFactory) * @see java.net.SocketImpl * @see java.nio.channels.SocketChannel * @since JDK1.0 */

N.B. Index and msg seq max value is 2147483647. Please notice that our iGateway will check the duplicate Index & Msg Seq. If there is different Caller, please make sure the Index & Msg Seq are unique.

polling
There are five messages for Caller to communicate with the iGateway. They are summarized as follows

iAsia Gateway – iGateway provides an ordering channel for external party. It facilitates external systems connecting to iAsia Broker Supplied System to place order to market. In addition, it provides enquiry channel to obtain real-time portfolio information of clients.
